Job description (Health Safety Environment Supervisor) for expats within Oman

Ryboa Haima is seeking a qualified and proactive HSE Advisor / Supervisor to join our team. The successful candidate will play a critical role in ensuring compliance with health, safety, and environmental regulations across our operations, fostering a safe workplace, and promoting a strong safety culture within the organization.Key Responsibilities:

✅ Monitor and enforce HSE standards and procedures in line with company policy and regulatory requirements.

✅ Conduct regular site inspections, audits, and risk assessments.

✅ Deliver HSE training and awareness programs for staff and contractors.

✅ Investigate incidents and prepare detailed reports with corrective actions.

✅ Ensure proper documentation and reporting of HSE activities.

✅ Support continuous improvement of HSE performance and initiatives.

Requirements:

🔹 Bachelor’s degree or diploma in Occupational Health & Safety, Environmental Science, or a related field.

🔹 Minimum 3–5 years of experience in an HSE Advisor or Supervisor role (preferably in oil & gas, or infrastructure projects).

🔹 Relevant certifications (NEBOSH, IOSH, etc.) in health and safety or OPAL HSE Apprenticeship Program.

🔹 Excellent communication and leadership skills.

🔹 Ability to work in remote site locations and adapt to field conditions.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates are invited to send their CV and copies of relevant certificates to:

📧 Email: hrm@ryboahaima.com

📅 Application Deadline: 31 March 2025
